Level 1 Conjuration Spell

Prevent targets from taking reactions.

On Save: Targets still take half damage but are able to use reactions.

Arms of Hadar is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Arms of Hadar is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Arms of Hadar Information

Description: Prevent targets from taking reactions. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: Self3m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Strength

How to Acquire Arms of Hadar in BG 3

Arms of Hadar can be acquired by the following classes: Warlock Arms of Hadar can be cast by using the following Items: Hollow's Staff

Arms of Hadar Tips & Notes for BG 3

Upcast: When cast with a 2nd level spell slot or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.
